Text.Name: SYS_LOST
Text.Desc: This Favor has been lost, as has all information concerning it. (Empty).

Text.Name: Opinion
Text.Desc: A special Favor label, used in sorting different opinions.

Text.Name: Distrust
Text.Desc: This world is run by profit, and the search for it. I don't trust anyone.

Text.Name: Enthusiasm
Text.Desc: Our meeting was predestined. We're all good friends!

Text.Name: BeReceived
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is charismatic, and has always been received well by others.

Text.Name: BeTrueMan
Text.Desc: Others hold [HENAME] in high regard for their real-life experience.

Text.Name: Loyal
Text.Desc: [HENAME] has a strong sense of justice, and makes a good friend.

Text.Name: BeiGuoXia
Text.Desc: [HENAME] often shoulders the blame for others, earning the affection of their peers.

Text.Name: DongShiZhang
Text.Desc: [HENAME], that's our boss alright!

Text.Name: HaoShuang
Text.Desc: Just of heart and chivalrous by nature, [HENAME] inspires friendship in those around them!

Text.Name: BeginTogether
Text.Desc: [HENAME] traveled the lands at my side.

Text.Name: Charisma0
Text.Desc: Charisma Favor 0
Text.Layers.0.Desc: Why do people like [HENAME] have to exist...
Text.Layers.1.Desc: It's hard work, trying to get on with [HENAME].
Text.Layers.2.Desc: Despite not being great at getting along with others, [HENAME] is a good person really.

Text.Name: Charisma1
Text.Desc: Charisma Favor 1
Text.Layers.0.Desc: [HENAME] is a fraud, acting all high and mighty.
Text.Layers.2.Desc: It's easy getting along with [HENAME] as they're so considerate.

Text.Name: Charisma2
Text.Desc: Charisma Favor 2
Text.Layers.0.Desc: I can't stand [HENAME], but they are valiant, it's true.
Text.Layers.2.Desc: Getting along with [HENAME] is truly a joy. They're a little ray of sunshine, and a great friend.

Text.Name: Relative
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is my [TXT].

Text.Name: Practice
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is my [TXT].

Text.Name: PracticeOther
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is my [TXT].

Text.Name: Family
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is my [TXT].

Text.Name: Friend
Text.Desc: Friendship Favor 2
Text.Layers.0.Desc: [HENAME] is my friend, although we've been having problems as of late.
Text.Layers.1.Desc: [HENAME] is a good friend of mine.

Text.Name: Scar
Text.Desc: [HENAME] has got a nasty scar on their face.

Text.Name: Fancy
Text.Desc: Attraction

Text.Name: Lover
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is my lover.

Text.Name: VisceralScar
Text.Desc: [HENAME] has a terrible scar on their body that hurts to look at.

Text.Name: Evilfaced
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is just plain ugly, not at all easy on the eyes.

Text.Name: BeautifulFace
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is a true beauty, spreading happiness with their looks alone.

Text.Name: Cruel
Text.Desc: [HENAME]'s behavior toward others is just awful, I can't stand it.

Text.Name: Affinity
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is warm and accommodating, making it easy for others to get close to them.

Text.Name: SayHi
Text.Desc: [HENAME] and I shared a greeting.

Text.Name: AfterTalk
Text.Desc: I had a chat with [HENAME], it was pretty great.

Text.Name: DeepTalk
Text.Desc: I had a heart-to-heart talk with [HENAME]. We made quite a connection, and I think it drew us closer together.

Text.Name: Neglect
Text.Desc: I said something to [HENAME] but they hardly even acknowledged me. I don't even care, anyway. Whatever.

Text.Name: Quarrel
Text.Desc: I had a bit of a disagreement with [HENAME]. They don't know what they're talking about, it's the worst.

Text.Name: Insult
Text.Desc: [HENAME] and I traded insults. I really can't bear the sight of them, the moron.

Text.Name: SayHiFight
Text.Desc: I was making small talk with [HENAME] but for some reason things got all tense, and we started fighting. What a mess.

Text.Name: AfterTalkFight
Text.Desc: I had a chat with [TXT] and we ended up fighting for no real reason.

Text.Name: DeepTalkFight
Text.Desc: I opened my heart to [HENAME] but we entered into a heated argument, and even ended up coming to blows. It's such a shame.

Text.Name: NeglectFight
Text.Desc: I started talking to [HENAME] but they took offence to something I said, and we just ended up fighting each other.

Text.Name: QuarrelFight
Text.Desc: I had a quarrel with [TXT] that could only be resolved with fists.

Text.Name: InsultFight
Text.Desc: I traded insults with [HENAME]. The belligerent idiot had to be taught a lesson, with my fists.

Text.Name: WithYoung
Text.Desc: Attitude toward the younger generation.
Text.Layers.0.Desc: I think [HENAME] is an absolute rat.
Text.Layers.1.Desc: I think [HENAME] is still just a kid.

Text.Name: WithElder
Text.Desc: Attitude toward one's elders.
Text.Layers.0.Desc: I don't like being around [HENAME], makes me feel awkward.
Text.Layers.1.Desc: I reckon [HENAME] should be treated respectfully, on account of their age.

Text.Name: RivalInlove
Text.Desc: Love Rival
Text.Layers.0.Desc: Oh, if I could just shove a blade into [HENAME] and be done with it.
Text.Layers.1.Desc: I think [HENAME] and I are similar in a lot of ways.

Text.Name: PersonalEnemyBegin
Text.Desc: I can't stand to even be in the same room as [HENAME].

Text.Name: FeatureOpposition
Text.Desc: So that's the kind of person [HE] is. I despise [HE]. ([TXT])

Text.Name: FeatureClose
Text.Desc: I like people like [HE]. We're cut from the same cloth. ([TXT])

Text.Name: SameBackstory
Text.Desc: We've a lot of shared experience ([TXT]).

Text.Name: FeedGood
Text.Desc: Thanks for looking after me.

Text.Name: FeedBad
Text.Desc: What are you trying to feed me?

Text.Name: ThankTreat
Text.Desc: Thanks for helping me heal.

Text.Name: ThankHufa
Text.Desc: Thank you, master.

Text.Name: BeAttack
Text.Desc: Are you trying to kill me?

Text.Name: BeMagicBood
Text.Desc: Thank you, for all you've done for me.

Text.Name: BeMagicBad
Text.Desc: What did you just do to me?

Text.Name: AmuseME
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is a right barrel of laughs.

Text.Name: PersonalEnemy
Text.Desc: [HENAME] murdered [TXT].

Text.Name: MagicBad
Text.Desc: Witnessed [HENAME] harming [TXT].

Text.Name: MagicGood
Text.Desc: Witnessed [HENAME] using magic against [TXT].

Text.Name: BeDeclaration
Text.Layers.0.Desc: [HENAME] professed their feelings for me, haha.
Text.Layers.1.Desc: [HENAME] told me of their feelings for me. My heart's racing.

Text.Name: Favour_School_FiveTangZhu
Text.Desc: How can [HENAME] act as Branch Leader, with that kind of performance?

Text.Name: Favour_School_ZhangMen
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is our Sect Leader.

Text.Name: Favour_School_TangZhu
Text.Desc: [HENAME] is our Branch Leader.
